Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the validation certificate URI of a ValidationInformation structure.
        """
kwargs = {'validation_certificate_uri': 0}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The validation certificate URI must be a string.', objects.
    ValidationInformation, **kwargs)
args = objects.ValidationInformation(), 'validation_certificate_uri', 0
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The validation certificate URI must be a string.', setattr, *args)
